page.title: 07The Market Gardening Year
page.content: This is a farm of{4.2 hectares concentrating on{soft fruits, apples and{vegetables.}The permanent labour force is just the farmer and his wife. The fruit is grown for{'Pick your {own';}the vegetables sold locally. During{December}and{January buildings and machinery are repaired. {Fruit bushes}are pruned in February, and sowing of{peppers, leeks, celery and{french beans}takes place in March. {Strawberries}are cultivated in {March}and new ones planted in{April.} Spraying of fruit with fungicides is done in{May. Fruits}&{french beans are harvested from{June}to{July,}depending on the weather;{peppers}from{July through to{October. Raspberries}are pruned in{November}and the wires repaired in{December}for next year. The main problems of the farm are {frost}and{irrigation}in dry summers.
